message.content:
cs.DS, cs.CC, cs.CG, cs.DM, cs.GT. 

The paper deals with computational complexity and approximation algorithms for problems related to strings, which suggests it could belong to several sub-categories. The focus on optimization and approximation algorithms suggests cs.DS (Data Structures and Algorithms) and cs.CC (Computational Complexity) as likely categories. The use of geometric concepts such as Hamming distance suggests cs.CG (Computational Geometry) as another possibility. The problem of finding a maximum-size subset of input strings also suggests cs.DM (Discrete Mathematics) as a potential category. Finally, the mention of EPTAS and FPT suggests cs.GT (Computational Game Theory) as a possible category as well.
